title: SkillShareMarket Platform
description: Built a platform for users to offer and request freelance services, featuring service listings, secure payments, and media management. Enabled smooth user authentication and transaction flow with real-time updates.

title: Diabetes Prediction System
description: Predicts diabetes likelihood with 77% accuracy using an SVM model. Integrated with a Flutter frontend for quick and accessible health screening.

title: NewsInsights App
description: Developed an app with personalized news recommendations, categorization, and summarization from articles. Integrated a fake news detection module using NLP.

title: Mozzam Arts Showcase
description: Built a responsive landing page to showcase client artworks with smooth navigation and modern UI. Optimized for fast loading and mobile performance.
